newsitem.title: USA: Leucadia National amends tender offer price.
newsitem.headline: Leucadia National amends tender offer price.

text.p: Leucadia National Corp said Wednesday it has increased its tender offer to $1,072.50 per $1,000 principal amount in its bid to purchase all of its outstanding 10-3/8 percent senior subordinated notes due 2002.
The original offer was $1,070 per $1,000 principal amount.
The expiration date also has been extended to midnight EDT on October 15 rather than 1700 EDT on that date.

As of 1700 EDT on September 30, about $13.4 million of the notes had been validly tendered as part of the offer. Immediately before its commencement, there were $125 million principal amount of notes outstanding, the company said.
